title: Older women ‘disappear’ from BBC presenting roles, internal review finds - The Guardian
summary_full: Older women ‘disappear’ from BBC presenting roles, internal review finds  The GuardianBBC vows to better reflect working-class audiences around UK  BBCBBC tries too hard to push diversity into shows, viewers say  The TimesBBC Told To Avoid “Clunky” Color-Blind Casting & “Preachy” Anti-Colonial Storylines In Drama Series  DeadlineBBC told to stop ‘tick box’ diversity casting  The Telegraph
